segments.text: Good afternoon , how can I help ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hi there . I'd like to draw some cash from my Fund Account at the Securities Company . Could I check my balance before I withdraw anything ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . Your balance is 92,320 RIB in your Securities Account . How much would you like to withdraw ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'd like 20,000 RIB , please . If that's possible .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem . Please fill in this transfer form that will authorise us to send the amount from the Securities Company to your account .
segments.speaker: S1
